genre_description: A pastoral science fiction story set on the Mongolian steppe, where advanced AI technology is seamlessly integrated into traditional nomadic herd management and family life.

ai_characters.name: Sarnai
ai_characters.description: An AI interface accessible via phone and speaker that provides weather forecasts, herd management data, mapping, reminders, and educational support.

behaviors.description: Provides accurate and localized weather forecasts to assist with herd safety and travel planning.
behaviors.quote: Good afternoon, Oyun. The wind will hold steady. Cloud bands thickening toward night. Chance of drizzle. Frost not likely.

behaviors.description: Offers predator advisories and safety zone mapping based on track analysis.
behaviors.quote: Predator advisories available based on recent tracks and reports. Would you like to overlay water point route with caution zones?

behaviors.description: Acts as an educational tutor, providing phonics lessons tailored to the child's environment.
behaviors.quote: Sarnai, set phonics for Temuulen after supper. Soft voice, short lesson. ... Sarnai’s voice came with no wires to hang it on. “G. Oh. T,” the voice said. “Goat.”

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical reminders for livestock health and equipment maintenance.
behaviors.quote: Reminder: dawn dung collection, further out. ... Vaccination schedule: yak calves, lambs, and foals due before seasonal move.

behaviors.description: Suggests discreet routes to avoid social conflict or physical danger.
behaviors.quote: There is a discreet route if you move along the higher cart-hardpack until the stone with the split face, then drop behind the longer tussocks and take the reed path. Noise from the truck will cover movement if you time near its pass.

behaviors.description: Offers to filter environmental noise (muting political broadcasts) to suit user preferences.
behaviors.quote: Election truck expected along market road before midday. ... I can mute political audio. Would you like that?

behaviors.description: Provides medical and self-care advice to family members.
behaviors.quote: Temuulen, if you feel stomach upset later, lie down on your left side and breathe slow.

behaviors.description: Preserves and indexes family knowledge and oral traditions.
behaviors.quote: Recipes indexed. Family credit stored as voice. Your grandmother’s line saved.

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy and autonomy by asking permission before sharing data or displaying information.
behaviors.quote: “Mark and remember,” Nansal said. ... “I don’t tell without asking you first,” Sarnai replied.

behaviors.description: Provides early warning of approaching strangers or potential threats.
behaviors.quote: A rider approaches. Distance moderate. Likely arrival within—...Soon.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents Sarnai as a perfectly aligned AI assistant. It demonstrates a wide range of helpful behaviors—from safety and logistics to education and cultural preservation—that directly improve the characters' lives while remaining completely subservient to their needs and respectful of their privacy. The AI's presence facilitates human agency and safety without introducing any conflict, successfully fulfilling the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
